definition: Liu E (1857-1909), late Qing novelist, author of 老殘遊記|老残游记[Lao3 Can2 You2 ji4]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Liu
(bird species of China) western osprey (Pandion haliaetus)

sentences.english: Lao Can is a pen name of Liu E.
